name: unannotated
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
An unannotated document does not have any explanations or notes added to the text: When I managed to unearth my old, unannotated edition, I found that the missing passage amounts to 37 words. All 50 sections of the US Code, unannotated, easily take up an entire bookshelf at a law library. Related word
annotate formal
More examplesFewer examplesNo items are duplicated between the two separate bibliographic lists; that is, the item identified will not occur in both the annotated and the unannotated bibliography.No subcorpora are yet available for public distribution, in annotated or unannotated form.The chapter discusses guidelines for the annotation of a corpus, based on Leech's work, with one of the main points being that the unannotated corpus should be recoverable.
